column4: I wrote my own ftp client in tcl/tk, tclup, info here: http://www.baldwinlinguas.com
of course, it lacks a lot of the gui features of gftp
but it works for me
I also incorporated ftp functions in the text editor I wrote, TclText (http://freshmeat.net/projects/tickletext/)
that way I can edit my webpages in the text editor and up/download them from my servers, and stuff like that
it's a pretty good text editor
there is no ftp client on that page
hehe
what was that "enter your username" dialog when executing install.sh?
good to know

using synaptic...
